body:
This fixes an issue where the autotools where complaining that a conditional used in a `Makefile.am` must be created by `AM_CONDITIONAL`.

Curiously, using `autoconf@2.69` and `automake@1.16.1` on Ubuntu didn't show the problem, but using the same versions on RHEL  caused the install to fail.
title: adios: fix configure.ac/autotools issue that casues problems on some systems
